UNLIMITED MOTIVATION

Meet the best tutors.
Reach your full potential.
Now.

Find your motivation, experience the improvement

One of the most important things when you study a language is to stay engaged.

But too often, you get distracted, or simply too busy to maintain a high motivation level.

At FeliTalk, we hand-pick the most accomplished teachers, and build a user-friendly platform that empowers you to achieve your language learning goals by giving you unlimited motivation.

Teachers

Only the best, no compromises, your personal
helper to achieve your language goals

Platform

Top of the line design and technology
that amplify your gains

Materials

Original lesson materials designed to help
you stay engaged and have fun while learning

Subscription plans

Choose the plan that’s right for you

Basic plan

3,800 JPY /month

Basic plan includes:
  • 5 lessons
  • 2 coins for tip
  • Student will...

Standart plan

7,800 JPY /month

Basic plan includes:
  • 10 lessons
  • 5 coins for tip
  • Student will...

Premium plan

13,800 JPY /month

Basic plan includes:
  • 30 lessons
  • 20 coins for tip
  • Student will...
  • Subscribers of both plans can purchase additional lessons at the rate of 1,200 JPY/lesson
  • Coins are valid for 1 month, with new coins being given on the 1st day of the subscritpion, not used coins will NOT be carried over to next month
  • Extra coins can be purchased, 10 coins/1000 JPY, 30 coins/2800 JPY, 60 coins/4500 JPY
  • Student will have to option to upgrade from Basic to Premium plan during the month

How to pay

After free registration, students can subscribe and purchase coins from his/her personal pages.

  • This is a monthly subscription, except additional lessons and coins.
  • Students can book and take lessons after payment.
  • This is an automatic renewal at the end of each month, so there is no need for students to subscribe again.

Cancellation Policy

  • Students can book a lesson 30 mins before the start of the lesson.
  • Students can cancel a lesson without cost 60 mins before the start of the lesson, cancellations after 60 mins will be treated as a lesson taken.
